unnormalised: Interesting moves in the transfer window. Hope ISL clubs are scouting well. Mohun Bagan's rumoured interest in Sandesh Jhingan could be a game-changer. Reminds me of "Chak De! India" - building a strong team is key. A transfer fee of Rs. 5 Crore seems reasonable. Let's see if any players from the Tata Football Academy make a splash. Performance will be crucial for securing future transfers, maybe even to Europe for 100 km races! Good luck to all.
normalised: Interesting moves in the transfer window. Hope I S L clubs are scouting well. Mohun Bagan's rumoured interest in Sandesh Jhingan could be a game-changer. Reminds me of "Chak De! India" - building a strong team is key. A transfer fee of rupee five crore seems reasonable. Let's see if any players from the Tata Football Academy make a splash. Performance will be crucial for securing future transfers, maybe even to Europe for one hundred kilometer races! Good luck to all.
